alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 30 at 2:46AM EST until January 30 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minimum temperatures as low as 23 degrees in rural sheltered areas. Widespread freezing temperatures elsewhere. * WHERE...Lake and inland Volusia Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Small animals not normally conditioned to the cold temperatures should be adequately cared for.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
